medzoo.common.augment3D.elastic_deform module¶

class medzoo.common.augment3D.elastic_deform.ElasticTransform(alpha=1, sigma=20, c_val=0.0, method='linear')[source]¶

Bases: object

medzoo.common.augment3D.elastic_deform.elastic_transform_3d(img_numpy, labels=None, alpha=1, sigma=20, c_val=0.0, method='linear')[source]¶
Parameters

  • img_numpy – 3D medical image modality

  • labels – 3D medical image labels

  • alpha – scaling factor of gaussian filter

  • sigma – standard deviation of random gaussian filter

  • c_val – fill value

  • method – interpolation method. supported methods : (“linear”, “nearest”)

Returns

deformed image and/or label
